column4: hey guys, looking for help resuming from suspend. I get a black screen with a cursor that functions properly. I can generally restart X to get it to work. How do I get suspend to function properly
thnx for responding PurpZeY, i've been doing my research, but none of the solutions seem to work suspending from resume

i don#t know details, but that's a sign o fyour video driver not liking to put to sleep. the solution is unloading the driver before suspend/hibernate and reloading it after. google for details, or anyone else help
